name: Beyond Dusk
description:
How far Beyond Dusk will you last?

A group of five high school students decide to take a camping trip for the first weekend of Spring Break, as a way to celebrate their last year together. However, it doesn't take long for them to realize that something is amiss. You play as Myna, one of these students, as she explores the forest  and completes tasks and for her fellow campers.

Beyond Dusk is a campy, horror-adventure game with graphics inspired by the retro-3D era of games. As a personal project, it was made to experiment and test out various features in Unity.

Features:

  • Four different routes and endings.
  • A wooded forest to explore.
  • Original low-poly 3D assets.
  • 60+ unique dialogue conversations.

Controls:

  • Use WASD to move.
  • Press Enter to talk to NPCs.
  • Press Space to toggle flashlight.

Credits:

  • All assets, scripting and design done by Noirie.
  • Skybox and Pixelated camera filter found in the Unity Asset Store.

Changelog:

  • Version 1.0: First public build.
  • Version 1.1: Updated camera angle & fixed some dialog segments.
